subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Wright sat out Tuesday, second baseman Luis Castillo started despite a sore left leg, Ryan Church is recovering from postconcussion syndrome, and the Mets signed their first-round draft pick.
snippet: David Wright sat out Tuesday, second baseman Luis Castillo started despite a sore left leg, Ryan Church is recovering from postconcussion syndrome, and the Mets signed their first-round draft pick.
